articles.description: A young apprentice jockey having his very first race ride has been robbed of victory in unfortunate but fairly humorous circumstances.
articles.content: Young jockey Jacob Opperman has been robbed of victory at his very first race ride in unfortunate but fairly humorous circumstances.Piloting the heavily-backed Miss Gatsby ($9.50 into $3.10) in the opening event at Mount Gambier on Wednesday, the 16-year-old … [+1177 chars]

articles.title: Philadelphia 76ers threatened to bench Ben Simmons over lack of three point shooting - Wide World of Sports
articles.description: Coach held meeting with Aussie and his parents
articles.content:
In a meeting with Ben Simmons and his parents before the NBA season, Philadelphia 76ers coach Brett Brown threatened to bench the Australian if he didn't start shooting three-pointers.
The Australian's reluctance to shoot from beyond the arc has been a longs… [+3307 chars]

articles.title: Enjoy the football Newcastle fans. Don’t forget it was ‘bought by blood money’: UK view - Fox Sports
articles.description: Newcastle United are on the verge of a £300m takeover from a consortium led by a Saudi multi-billionaire.

articles.description: A former umpire has shed light on Cameron Bancroft's actions during one of Aussie cricket's darkest sagas.
